description:
Location: California

If you are unable to complete this application due to a disability, contact this employer to ask for an accommodation or an alternative application process.
Senior Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning Specialist

Regular Full-Time Software Design Costa Mesa, CA, US

5 days ago Requisition

Moffatt & Nichol specializes in large complex waterfront infrastructure projects and is recognized as one of the worldwide leaders in this field. We are seeking a Senior Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) Specialist to work from our Costa Mesa, CA (preferred) office or may work from your home in Arizona, California, Texas, or Washington but will travel to Moffatt & Nichol offices as needed.

As the successful new hire, you will lead the development and implementation of cutting-edge artificial intelligence and machine learning technology solutions to enhance the efficiency, safety, and sustainability of marine ports and inland facilities. This role offers an exciting opportunity to shape the future of AI/ML applications in our organization, fostering a culture of technological excellence and innovation. You will guide a multidisciplinary team to innovate and apply AI/ML techniques across our organization’s various disciplines, including but not limited to planning, optimization, civil, structural, inspection, electrical, mechanical, coastal modeling, and simulation.

You will drive the adoption of smart port technologies, ensuring our projects and services are at the forefront of the industry.

About Moffatt & Nichol:

Moffatt & Nichol is a leading U.S.

-based global infrastructure advisor specializing in the planning and design of facilities that shape and serve our coastlines, harbors and rivers, as well as an innovator in the transportation complexities associated with the movement of freight. For the 2 nd year in a row, Moffatt & Nichol is ranked Engineering News-Record #1 for Marine & Port Facilities and Top 20 in Transportation.

We were also named Southeast Design Firm of the Year 2023.

Moffatt & Nichol's professional staff includes engineers, planners, scientists and architects who serve our global client base from offices in Europe, North America, Latin America, and the Pacific Rim. The firm provides clients worldwide with customized service and a level of excellence that have become the firm’s hallmark in several primary practice areas – ports and harbors; coastal, environmental and water resources;

urban waterfronts and marinas; transportation, bridges and rail; inspection and rehabilitation; and energy.

Duties and responsibilities:

Leadership and Strategy
• Lead and inspire a talented team of data scientists, engineers, and analysts, setting clear objectives, managing resources, and ensuring timely delivery of projects
• Develop and implement a comprehensive AI and ML strategy aligned with the company's goals and the latest industry trends
• Engage with stakeholders to understand and refine project requirements
• Establish best practices for AI and ML development and application within the company, complying with relevant laws, regulations, and ethical standards

Project Management
• Monitor project and development progress, ensuring adherence to budget and schedule
• Continuously refine prototypes and models, addressing and resolving performance issues to ensure optimal functionality and efficiency
• Regularly review, monitor, and optimize AI/ML processes and workflows for efficiency and effectiveness
• Manage risks and solve problems proactively
• Maintain comprehensive and up-to-date project documentation

Technical Development
• Provide expert oversight on the technical aspects of AI/ML projects, ensuring the application of advanced methodologies and cutting-edge technologies
• Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI/ML, integrating innovative practices into project workflows
• Apply sophisticated machine learning techniques to enhance the efficiency and quality of data processing and product offerings, especially for smart port applications including automation, predicative maintenance, optimization models, simulation and emulation tools
• Develop and refine software and project solutions using programming languages such as Python and R, tailoring these solutions to support AI/ML project objectives
• Analyze patterns and trends within datasets to uncover valuable insights, providing strategic recommendations for business model improvements and enhancements

Collaboration and Communication
• Foster a collaborative environment, ensuring effective communication and stakeholder engagement
• Maintain clear and consistent communication, ensuring all parties are aligned with project goals

Other duties:

Please note this job posting is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change at any time with or without notice.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science or a…
